title: Is it unhealthy to wear my Fitbit all the time? - Quora

response.answer_text: There's no conclusive evidence that wearable technology devices, which emit low-powered, non-ionizing radio frequency (RF) energy, are either safe or risky. A Fitbit tracker emits less than 1% of the power output compared to a typical cell phone. The general consensus is that this is a negligible exposure, and does not contribute to any ill effects. All these products meet the FCC requirements.
